instruction: Compose a song about the first moon landing.
output:
Verse 1 
On a journey to the moon, one small step for man
A rocket to explore the stars, an incredible plan
The world was filled with questions and doubt
But we soon would have a new route

Chorus 
It was a giant leap for every man and woman
The first time on the moon, something so amazing 
To the pioneers, our honor we raise 
Who took that giant leap and amazed

Verse 2
The Eagle had landed and the flag had gone high 
The Eagle had taken us where no man had ever gone by 
It marked a new era for the world
As voices sang and flags were unfurled

Chorus 
It was a giant leap for every man and woman
The first time on the moon, something so amazing 
To the pioneers, our honor we raise 
Who took that giant leap and amazed

Bridge
Our bounds of exploration will never end
As long as we have courage and strength 
The wonders of the stars await us all
We'll take it one step at a time and never fall 

Chorus 
It was a giant leap for every man and woman
The first time on the moon, something so amazing 
To the pioneers, our honor we raise 
Who took that giant leap and amazed
